subject: Commission payment policy
description_text:
hello simsonn support team
my name is: Kien Le
i have been participating in your affiliate marketing program for a while
now. initially created a little bit of small results. in the future i plan
to optimize my ads, to introduce simsonn to more potential customers.
however, to be assured of the advertising optimization campaign, i would
like to know when i will receive my commission?
best regards

conversations.body_text: Hi KIÊN LE,     Thank you for your excellent work and we will complete the payment before the end of the month. May I ask through what channels you advertised, we need to register the information to submit the expenses for approval to our manager. Thank you again.

Hello Support Team

Thank you very much for your message and kind words.

I am currently promoting your products through the following channels:

Google Ads Search and Display

Facebook Ads and other Meta platforms.

Thank you again for the opportunity to work together.
Best regards

Vào Th 2, 23 thg 6, 2025 vào lúc 15:32 service@simsonn.com <
service@simsonn.com> đã viết:

> Hi KIÊN LE,
>
> Thank you for your excellent work and we will complete the payment before
> the end of the month. May I ask through what channels you advertised, we
> need to register the information to submit the expenses for approval to our
> manager. Thank you again.
>

>

​Dear Kien,  Thank you for your continued effort in promoting Simsonn products — we truly appreciate your work!  We’re happy to let you know that your commission has already been paid. Additionally, we have increased your commission rate to 12% moving forward.  Keep up the great work, and we look forward to growing this collaboration together!  Best regards, Simsonn Support Team

Hi
I have received my first payment. I am grateful for that.
Hope to have a good and sustainable cooperation in the future.
Best regards
